radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates a mildly increased echotexture without evidence of focal lesion. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Portal vein is patent and shows normal hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder demonstrates one shadowing stone within it, areas of focal gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 5 mm, and an impacted shadowing stone in the cystic duct measuring approximately 13 x 15 mm. No pericholecystic fluid is seen.
